page.title: 18HOUSE IN HUNTINGDON.BUNGALOW
page.content: I live in a bungalow made from red bricks and grey tiles. There is a path all round the house and a front and back garden.Inside the house we have a kitchen and next to that the dining room where we eat.In this room we have a table and six chairs.Next to the dining room is the lounge. We spend a lot of our time in the lounge playing and watching t.v. There is also a settee and matching chairs. Next to the lounge is the hall which leads to the three bedroom . All these have beds and wardrobes in .We have two bath rooms and a toilet.We also have a utility room for our washing machine.The house is heated by gas radiator central heating.
